You are now registered for this complimentary monthly customer service webinar series for your Respond ePCR or TriTech.com ePCR (formerly Fusion ePCR) software. DATE: Every Second Wednesday of the Month TIME: 11:30 AM ET l 10:30 AM CT l 9:30 AM MT l 8:30 AM PT PRESENTER: Kelly Wachal - TriTech Supervisor of Customer Service and Education AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the number shown on your screen after login
We look forward to seeing you online!
